name: AstroKitty
description:
Made for the Epic MagaJam 2019!

You are Sir Felix Fluffykins, space explorer extraordinaire and you are almost home after your longest voyage of discovery yet! There is but one small problem, your heat shield is gone, and you are moving towards earth at an alarming speed. Avoid the incoming asteroids and collect scattered metal to rebuild your heat shield so that you can survive re-entry but watch out for the UFO's that will steal your hard-earned metal.
